text: Did you know that Japanese bento is famous all around the world?
This is because of the ingredients, as well as the boxes that the bento is put in.
In Kyoto, there is a store that only makes bento boxes.
Why did you decide to open a bento box store?
Which bento boxes do you recommend?
And, now, a special announcement from Mr. Thomas!
Can people visit your store, even if they can't speak Japanese?
I was really nervous to go outside today...
...but my guest, Mr. Thomas, was wonderfully kind and helpful!
I will meet a lot more people and show all of you further facets of Japanese food culture!
I will make my Chef proud!
